name: Realm of Dragn'tor
description:
Technical Games Production Project.

Completed by a group of Staffordshire University students for an assignment;

  • Tom Timmins - UI and Main Menu
  • Juliusz Kaczmarek - Camera and Audio
  • Ryan Goldsmith - Enemy AI and Graphics
  • Rece Thompson-Hamilton - Terrain, Towers and Graphics
  • Dom Davies - MiniMap

Developed in Unity.
